sentences.en: A CD-ROM can store more than 250,000 pages of typed text.
sentences.cn: 一张只读光盘能存储25万多页键入的文本。

sentences.en: Burton's text is concise and informative.
sentences.cn: 伯顿的文章语言简洁，信息丰富。

sentences.en: He undertook to edit the text himself.
sentences.cn: 他答应亲自编辑正文的内容。

sentences.en: One CD-ROM disk can hold over 100,000 pages of text.
sentences.cn: 一张光盘可以存储十多万多页的文字资料。

sentences.en: Some of the original text has survived. ＃
sentences.cn: 一些原始教材保留了下来。

sentences.en: The first words of the text filled us with misgiving.
sentences.cn: 正文开头的文字让我们颇为担心。

sentences.en: The machine can recognise hand-written characters and turn them into printed text.
sentences.cn: 这种机器能够识别手写字体，并将其转化为打印文本。

sentences.en: The text is approachable, coping well with quite complicated subjects.
sentences.cn: 这篇课文把相当复杂的主题讲述得深入浅出、通俗易懂。

sentences.en: The text is good in parts, but suffers from discontinuity.
sentences.cn: 文章分开看还好，但是问题在于不连贯。

sentences.en: The transcriptions of the text were available as early as 1960.
sentences.cn: 原文的转写本早在1960年就可获取。

sentences.en: There should not be too much text in children’s books.
sentences.cn: 儿童书籍里不应该有太多的文字。

sentences.en: Two fourteenth-century manuscripts of this text are still extant.
sentences.cn: 这个文本仍有两份14世纪手抄本存世。

sentences.en: Using the option to display only text speeds things up a lot.
sentences.cn: 选用纯文本显示可以使速度大幅提升。

sentences.en: We examine the wording in detail before deciding on the final text.
sentences.cn: 我们彻底仔细地检查了措词后才最终定稿。

sentences.en: We have omitted footnotes which we judged inessential to the text.
sentences.cn: 我们略掉了我们认为对正文不甚紧要的脚注。

sentences.en: We need to become critical text-readers.
sentences.cn: 我们需要培养对文章的评判能力。

phrases.tran_cn: [电脑]明码通信报文（等于plain text）
纯文本；没有加密过的文件
[计]文本区域；多行文本输入区
文字编辑器，文本编辑器
文转声；语音合成；文本转语音

trans.tran_cn: 文本，原文，课文，教科书，主题，版本

trans.tran_en: to send someone a written message on a  mobile phone
